topics.body:
"@SidewardManatee":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55960e156368720df1002887#post_55960e156368720df1002887
It works on EVERY level. There are so many direction choices that are nothing short of pure GENIUS. Using the Muses as a literal Greek Chorus is one of the best things ever. Hercules himself was a fantastic protagonist and Disney hero. Hades is the perfect balance of funny and evil. And the message of heroism is something that all kids can aspire to be.
